name: Bertrand STIVALET
body:
## About me
Hello, I'm Bertrand. I work for the [National Institute of Standards and Technology](http://samate.nist.gov). I graduated in 2011 from [TELECOM Nancy](http://telecomnancy.univ-lorraine.fr/en), a leading engineering school at the University of Lorraine for a Master's degree in Computer Science with a minor in networking and security.  

Here you will find my work and personal project [https://github.com/stivalet](https://github.com/stivalet)

## Publications
### Papers
* **Evaluating Bug Finders - Test and Measurement of Static Code Analyzers**, May 2015    
Aurelien Delaitre, Bertrand Stivalet, Elizabeth Fong, Vadim Okun  
_Complex faUlts and Failures in LargE Software Systems (COUFLESS'15), Firenze, Italy_  

### Presentations
* **Evaluating Bug Finders - Test and Measurement of Static Code Analyzers**, May 2015    
_Complex faUlts and Failures in LargE Software Systems (COUFLESS'15), Firenze, Italy_  

* **CVE-Selected Analysis Results**, March 2014  
_Static Analysis Tool Exposition (SATE) V Workshop, Gaithersburg, MD, USA_  

## Contact
* Firstname . Lastname @gmail.com   
* [b_stivalet@Twitter](https://twitter.com/B_Stivalet)
